properties.entry: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS "Courses" ( "Number" int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, "Department" int(10) unsigned default NULL, "Course" int(10) unsigned default NULL, "Section" tinyint(3) unsigned default NULL, "Name" varchar(100) default NULL, "InstructorNumber" int(10) unsigned default NULL, PRIMARY KEY ("Number") ) AUTO_INCREMENT=100;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS Users ( Number INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY, LoginID VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE NOT NULL, LoginPassword VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, Email VARCHAR(100), FirstName VARCHAR(20), LastName VARCHAR(20), UserType ENUM('Unregistered','Student','Instructor','Administrator','Guest') NOT NULL DEFAULT 'Unregistered', Notes TEXT) AUTO_INCREMENT = 100;

INSERT INTO Users(LoginID, LoginPassword, UserType) VALUES ('admin', 'admin', 'Administrator'), ('instructor', 'instructor', 'Instructor'), ('student', 'student', 'Student'), ('guest', 'guest', 'Guest');

CREATE TABLE "Notes" ( "Number" int(10) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, "StartTime" datetime default NULL, "EndTime" datetime default NULL, "InstructorNumber" int(10) unsigned default NULL, "AccessRights" enum('Everyone','AllStudents','CourseStudents','Instructors','Self') default 'Everyone', "NoteType" enum('Unspecified','General','Lesson','StaticEvent','DynamicEvent','Personal') default 'Unspecified', "Note" text, PRIMARY KEY ("Number") ) AUTO_INCREMENT=100;

CREATE TABLE "Resources" ( "Number" int(11) NOT NULL auto_increment, "Type" enum('undefined','WeatherCamera','WeatherMapLoop','WeatherStation','WeatherStationValues','TextFile','WeatherStationDailyLog','WeatherStationHourlyLog','WeatherMovie','WeatherImage') NOT NULL default 'undefined', "Name" varchar(200) NOT NULL, "RetrievalMethod" enum('URL','FileLoad','Manual','undefined') NOT NULL default 'undefined', "StorageFolderName" varchar(200) default NULL, "Format" enum('unknown','comma_seperated_values','txt','jpeg','gif','png','mov','mjpg','image','space_seperated_values') default 'unknown', "URL" blob, "Interval" int(11) unsigned NOT NULL, "Active" tinyint(1) unsigned default '1', "Valid" tinyint(1) unsigned default '1', "DateInitiated" date default NULL, "CollectionSpan" enum('DaylightHours','FullTime','SpecifiedTimes'), "StartTime" time default NULL, "EndTime" time default NULL, "Latitude" float default '41.0068', "Longitude" float default '-76.4143', PRIMARY KEY ("Number"), UNIQUE KEY "Name" ("Name") ) AUTO_INCREMENT=100;
